attributes.action: Rethink his policy regarding the trust fund for Taliban Fighters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recent initiatives by this government have proved that rewarding truancy, criminal behaviour etc does not work.
With this in mind I would suggest paying the Taliban to stop fighting is futile,they will simply take the money and continue.
It is time to stop meddling in Afghanistan politics and leave the country.
Sign this petition now to make this government listen to the majority for once.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
